extensionDescription.message: Helps people to understand websites with difficult content.

login_welcome.message: Thank you for installing Easy Reading

login_type_text.message: How do you want to sign in?

login_type_google_p1.message:
Do you have a Google account?
You can use it to sign in.

login_type_google_p2.message:
Your personal settings will be saved.
Even if you shut down your browser and restart.

login_type_facebook_p1.message:
Do you have a Facebook account?
You can use it to sign in.

login_type_facebook_p2.message:
Your personal settings will be saved.
Even if you shut down your browser and restart.

login_type_anonymous_p1.message:
Would you prefer to remain incognito?
You can sign in as an anonymous user.

login_type_anonymous_p2.message:
Your personal settings will not be saved.
Once you sign out all settings will be lost.
